essay.question-text: The students discuss solutions to a problem the man is having. Describe the problem. Then state what you think of the solution they discuss.
essay.sample-answer-text:
SAMPLE ANSWER
In this conversation, the man and woman are discussing a problem the man is having in a sociology class. The man wants to talk with the woman because she already took the same course. The problem that he's having is that he can't follow what the professor says in class and therefore can't take good notes.
To deal with this problem, the woman tells him that he should get together with some of his classmates and compare notes after the lectures. She suggests this because this is how she handled the course herself.
I think that this is a good idea. It's always a good idea to get together with classmates to go over a class together. I always try to get together with classmates to go over a class together. I always try to get to know other students when I take a class because this makes the class much easier.
